subject: To whom It May Concern
body: As I have been working for some time now by observation and the direct causal factors involved with the concurrent given the current state of the public that the tobacco industry should pay for their respiratory, cardiovascular, and cancerous illnesses. I believe your interests influence the individual that contributes to his addiction and/or illness. It is known that alcohol depletes catecholamines intracellularly. Many of the drugs pushed by the psychiatric industry are observed to be affected by phenothiazine. For example, given the demonstration of the effects produced also by alcohol toward continuing tobacco use and/or dependence. One can perhaps conclude that continuing alcohol use is a factor in tobacco being known to have catecholamine production and storage mechanisms. Demonstrating this link and availing the public of this.
